history.proof: intros h st client id c out st' ps e Hreq Hin. apply handleClientRequest_log in Hreq. destruct Hreq as [_ [Hlog | Hleader]]. - rewrite Hlog. auto. - hauto lq: on depth: 3.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
plceti: prevLog_candidateEntriesTerm_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)) (e : entry), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> In e (log st) -> In e (log st')

Premises:
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
id = fun (A : Type) (x : A) => x : ID Expanded type for implicit arguments id : forall A : Type, A -> A Arguments id {A} x : rename
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntriesReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%
handleClientRequest = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (state : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) => match type state with | Leader => let index := S (maxIndex (log state)) in ([], RaftState.set_raft_data_shouldSend term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_matchIndex term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state ({| eAt := me; eClient := client; eId := id;
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
handleClientRequest_matchIndex_maxIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> maxIndex (log st') = maxIndex (log st) /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st \/ assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex st') h 0 = maxIndex (log st')
handleClientRequest_matchIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> maxIndex (log st') = maxIndex (log st) /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st \/ matchIndex st' = assoc_set name_eq_dec (matchIndex st) h (maxIndex (log st')) /\ maxIndex (log st') = S (maxIndex (log st))
handleClientRequest_no_append_entries : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> In m ps -> ~ is_append_entries (snd m)

handleClientRequest_stateMachine : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> stateMachine st' = stateMachine st

handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
handleClientRequest_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st

handleClientRequest_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
handleClientRequest_candidate : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (os, st', m) -> type st' = Candidate -> st' = st
handleClientRequest_term_votedFor : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (os, st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st

handleTimeout_messages : forall (out : list raft_output) (st : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (h : name) (mi : logIndex) (mt : term) (m : name * msg) (st' : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', l) -> In m l -> snd m = RequestVote t n mi mt -> maxIndex (log st') = mi /\ maxTerm (log st') = mt /\ t = currentTerm st'

update_elections_data_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) => let '(_, st', _) := handleClientRequest me (snd st) client id c in if length (log (snd st)) <? length (log st') then match log st' with | [] => fst st | e :: _ => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := cronies (fst st); leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := (currentTerm st', e) :: allEntries (fst st) |} end else fst st : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params),...
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> gd = update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
doGenericServer_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ps) -> log st' = log st
doGenericServer_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (out, st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
haveNewEntries_true : forall (st : raft_data) (es : list entry), haveNewEntries st es = true -> es <> [] /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = Some e /\ eTerm e <> maxTerm es))

leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
tryToBecomeLeader_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), tryToBecomeLeader n st = (out, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
leader_sublog_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
doGenericServer_log_type_term_votesReceived : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votesReceived st' = votesReceived st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st

```coq
intros h st client id c out st' ps e Hreq Hin.
apply handleClientRequest_log in Hreq.
destruct Hreq as [_ [Hlog | Hleader]].
- rewrite Hlog. assumption.
- destruct Hleader as [e' [Heq [HeIndex [HeTerm [_ [_ [_ [Htype _]]]]]]]].
  rewrite Heq. simpl. right. assumption.
Qed.
```
